title: ML Projects at NYU
subtitle: NYU Tandon School of Engineering
para: Designed and trained over 20 ML models including regressors, classifiers, ensembles, neural networks, and reinforcement learning agents. Focused on scalable MLOps pipelines and model serving efficiency for deployment on cloud platforms like AWS.

title: Certify
subtitle: Yelp-style full stack car listings platform
para: Developed a complete web application featuring listings, image uploads, geolocation clustering, search filters, user authentication, and reviews. Built REST APIs, implemented authorization, and deployed with production-ready tools.
